Package ohos.nfc.tag

Class NfcATag

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.nfc.tag.TagManager
      • ohos.nfc.tag.NfcATag

  • public class NfcATag
extends TagManager
    Provides interfaces to control the read and write of tags that support the NFC-A technology.

    This class is inherited from the TagManager abstract class, and provides methods to create NfcATag objects and obtain the ATQA and SAK.

    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Communication#NFC

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static NfcATag getInstance​(TagInfo tagInfo)
        Obtains an NfcATag object based on the tag information.

        During tag reading, if the tag supports the NFC-A technology, an NfcATag object will be created based on the tag information.

        Parameters:
        tagInfo - Indicates the tag information.
        Since:
        1
